properties.headline: Flood Warning issued February 10 at 2:16PM CST until February 11 at 5:24PM CST by NWS Memphis TN
properties.description:
The National Weather Service has reissued a Flood Warning for the
Yalobusha River at Calhoun city for higher flooding.

The National Weather Service in Memphis TN has issued a

* Flood Warning for
the Yalobusha River at Calhoun City
* from Monday February 10 until at least Tuesday February 11.
* At 1 PM Monday the stage was...22.4 feet.
* Moderate flooding is forecast.
* Maximum forecast stage of 24.0 feet on Tuesday February 11.
* Flood stage is 23.0 feet.
* Forecast to rise above flood stage by Monday February 10 and
continue to rise to near 24.0 feet by Tuesday February 11.
* At 24.0 feet...Extensive agriculture flooding is occurring. Access
to low-lying areas restricted due to flood waters covering
secondary roads.
properties.instruction:
A followup Flood Statement will be issued when conditions warrant.

For graphical river and flood information...please go to
www.weather.gov and click near Memphis on the map, then select Rivers
and Lakes.

Do not drive through flooded areas...turn around don't drown.

Stay tuned to your weather radio and your local news media for the
latest river information.
